page.title: 02RIVERSIDE CARAVAN PARK,ELGIN
page.content:
Riverside Caravan Park Elgin
Riverside Caravan Park lies on the banks of the River Lossie, half a mile west of Elgin on the south side of the A96.This makes it an ideal centre for touring Moray. It is a small picturesque park with plenty of grassy spaces, trees and a children's play area. Permits for fishing in the Lossie can be bought at the shop.The owners, Mr. and Mrs Cow,are pleased that many tourists return year after year. There are seven static caravans and space for forty-three tourers. A few tents can also be accommodated.
